name: createDynamicProxy
returns: Meta data structure related to the current session
description: creates a dynamic proxy of the ColdFusion component that is passed to a Java library. Dynamic proxy lets you pass ColdFusion components to Java objects. Java objects can work with the ColdFusion components seamlessly as if they are native Java objects.

params.name: fullyQualifiedNameOfCFC
params.description: Fully qualified name of the ColdFusion component or a CFC instance.

params.name: interfaceName
params.description: An array of Java interfaces for which you want to create the dynamic proxy.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code:
<cfset instance=new cfc.helloWorld()> 
 <cfset dynInstnace = createDynamicProxy(instance, ["MyInterface"])> 
 <cfset x = createObject("java","InvokeHelloProxy").init(dynInstnace)> 
 <cfset y = x.invokeHello()> 
 <cfoutput>#y#</cfoutput>
